messages.content: I want to write a heartfelt note to my partner. We've been together for 3 years and I want to express how much I appreciate their support during a difficult time at work. The tone should be warm and sincere, not overly dramatic. Please create a love note with the following structure as JSON: {"style": "soft/flirty/serious", "spokenResponse": "what you'd say to me conversationally", "noteDraft": "the actual note text", "tags": ["#tag1", "#tag2", "#tag3"]}
